message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $80 to us, but I'm willing to start the negotiation at $100. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to propose a different price.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I must maintain the value of our product. I am willing to negotiate further, so I propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.

Thank you for considering my budgetary constraints, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $92 for the product. This price still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of your product.

I appreciate your consideration, Bob. I'm glad we're able to find a middle ground. In light of your latest offer, I propose a counteroffer of $93 for the product. I believe this price reflects both the value of our product and your budgetary needs.
